SELECT ta.SubjectCode as subjectCode, ta.MainCode as activityCode, ty.ActivityName as activityName, min(CONVERT(varchar(30), ta.ActivityFromDate, 23)) as activityFromDate, max(CONVERT(varchar(30), ta.ActivityToDate, 23)) as activityToDate, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tg.ActivityType as activityClassify, null as campaignValid, null as needBuyFlag, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),max(tb.ExPoint)),0) as exNeedPoint, 0 as detailType FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as ta with(nolock) Left join Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity as ty with(nolock) on ta.MainCode = ty.ActivityCode Left join Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp as tg with(nolock) on tg.BIN_PromotionActGrpID = ty.BIN_PromotionActGrpID Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpv.BarCode, tpb.UnitCode, tpb.PromotionCateCD, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.IsExchanged, tpb.ExPoint FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID and ta.PrtType = 'P' Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on ta.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' WHERE ta.ValidFlag = 1 AND ta.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ta.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ta.ActivityFromDate <= #nowTime# AND ta.ActivityToDate >= #nowTime# AND (ta.BIN_OrganizationID = -8888 or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) AND ta.ActivityType = '0' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule b WHERE ty.ActivityCode =b.RuleCode )
tg.ActivityType != 'DHHD'
tg.ActivityType = 'DHHD'
GROUP BY ta.SubjectCode, ta.MainCode, ty.ActivityName, ta.ActivityType, tg.ActivityType

SELECT ta.SubjectCode as subjectCode, ta.MainCode as activityCode, tr.SubCampaignName as activityName, min(CONVERT(varchar(30), ta.ActivityFromDate, 23)) as activityFromDate, max(CONVERT(varchar(30), ta.ActivityToDate, 23)) as activityToDate, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tc.CampaignType as activityClassify, tr.SubCampaignValid as campaignValid, tc.NeedBuyFlag as needBuyFlag, tc.GotCounter as gotCounter, 0 as exNeedPoint, 0 as detailType FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as ta with(nolock) Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tr with(nolock) on ta.MainCode = tr.SubCampaignCode Inner join Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition as tt with(nolock) on tr.BIN_CampaignRuleID = tt.BIN_CampaignRuleID Inner join Campaign.BIN_CampaignBaseProp as tp with(nolock) on tt.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = tp.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AND tp.PropertyName = 'baseProp_customer' Left join Campaign.BIN_Campaign as tc with(nolock) on tr.BIN_CampaignID = tc.BIN_CampaignID Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on ta.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' WHERE tr.ValidFlag = 1 AND ta.ValidFlag = 1 AND ta.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ta.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ta.ActivityFromDate <= #nowTime# AND ta.ActivityToDate >= #nowTime# AND (ta.BIN_OrganizationID = -8888 or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) AND ta.ActivityType = '1' AND tt.ValidFlag = 1 AND tt.ActLocationType in('5','6','4') GROUP BY ta.SubjectCode, ta.MainCode, tr.SubCampaignName, ta.ActivityType, tc.CampaignType, tr.SubCampaignValid, tc.NeedBuyFlag, tc.GotCounter

SELECT ta.SubjectCode as subjectCode, ta.MainCode as activityCode, tr.SubCampaignName as activityName, min(CONVERT(varchar(30), ta.ActivityFromDate, 23)) as activityFromDate, max(CONVERT(varchar(30), ta.ActivityToDate, 23)) as activityToDate, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tc.CampaignType as activityClassify, tr.SubCampaignValid as campaignValid, tc.NeedBuyFlag as needBuyFlag, tc.GotCounter as gotCounter, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),max(tb.ExPoint)),0) as exNeedPoint, 0 as detailType FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as ta with(nolock) Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tr with(nolock) on ta.MainCode = tr.SubCampaignCode Left join Campaign.BIN_Campaign as tc on tr.BIN_CampaignID = tc.BIN_CampaignID Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpv.BarCode, tpb.UnitCode, tpb.PromotionCateCD, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.IsExchanged, tpb.ExPoint FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID and ta.PrtType = 'P' Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on ta.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' WHERE tr.ValidFlag = 1 AND ta.ValidFlag = 1 AND tc.ValidFlag = 1 AND ta.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ta.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ta.ActivityFromDate <= #nowTime# AND ta.ActivityToDate >= #nowTime# AND (ta.BIN_OrganizationID = -8888 or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) AND ta.ActivityType = '1' AND tr.SubCampaignValid != '2' AND tc.SendFlag = 1 AND tc.CampaignType != 'LYHD' GROUP BY ta.SubjectCode, ta.MainCode, tr.SubCampaignName, ta.ActivityType, tc.CampaignType, tr.SubCampaignValid, tc.NeedBuyFlag, tc.GotCounter

SELECT tc.GotCounter as gotCounter, td.CampaignCode as subjectCode, tr.SubCampaignCode as activityCode, tr.SubCampaignName as activityName, min(CONVERT(varchar(30), td.GetFromTime, 23)) as activityFromDate, max(CONVERT(varchar(30), td.GetToTime, 23)) as activityToDate, 1 as activityType, tc.CampaignType as activityClassify, tr.SubCampaignValid as campaignValid, tc.NeedBuyFlag as needBuyFlag, 0 as exNeedPoint, 1 as detailType FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder as td with(nolock) Inner join Campaign.BIN_Campaign as tc on td.CampaignCode = tc.CampaignCode Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tr with(nolock) on tc.BIN_CampaignID = tr.BIN_CampaignID WHERE td.ValidFlag = 1 AND td.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND td.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND (td.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# or td.Mobile = #mobilePhone# ) AND td.GetFromTime <= #nowTime# AND td.GetToTime >= #nowTime# AND td.[State] = 'AR' GROUP BY td.CampaignCode, tr.SubCampaignCode, tr.SubCampaignName, tr.SubCampaignValid, tc.CampaignType, tc.NeedBuyFlag, tc.GotCounter

SELECT ta.MainCode as mainCode, ta.CountActCode as counterActCode, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tb.PromotionCateCD as promotionType, ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID as productVendorId, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.UnitCode when 'P' then tb.UnitCode end) as unitCode, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.BarCode when 'P' then tb.BarCode end) as barCode, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.NameTotal when 'P' then tb.NameTotal end) as productName, tr.Quantity as quantity, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.OldPrice when 'P' then -tr.OldPrice end) as oldPrice, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Price when 'P' then -tr.Price end) as price, ta.PrtType as proType, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.IsStock when 'P' then tb.IsStock end) as isStock, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),tb.ExPoint),0) as exPoint FROM (SELECT th.MainCode, th.CountActCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as th Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on th.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' and #nowTime# between th.ActivityFromDate and th.ActivityToDate WHERE th.ValidFlag = 1 and th.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# and th.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# and (th.BIN_OrganizationID='-8888' or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) GROUP BY th.MainCode, th.CountActCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType )as ta Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.PromotionCateCD, tpb.IsExchanged, tpb.ExPoint, tpb.IsStock FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_ProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.IsStock FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_Product as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_ProductID = tpv.BIN_ProductID ) as tt on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tt.BIN_ProductVendorID Left join( SELECT A.ActivityCode, B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity as A with(nolock) Inner join Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule as B with(nolock) on A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID ) as tc on ta.MainCode = tc.ActivityCode Left join Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult as tr with(nolock) on tc.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = tr.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID and ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID=tr.BIN_ProductVendorID WHERE ta.MainCode = #activityCode# AND ta.ActivityType = #activityType#

SELECT ta.MainCode as mainCode, ta.CountActCode as counterActCode, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tb.PromotionCateCD as promotionType, ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID as productVendorId, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.UnitCode when 'P' then tb.UnitCode end) as unitCode, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.BarCode when 'P' then tb.BarCode end) as barCode, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.NameTotal when 'P' then tb.NameTotal end) as productName, tr.Quantity as quantity, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.salePrice when 'P' then -tb.StandardCost end) as oldPrice, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Price when 'P' then -tr.Price end) as price, ta.PrtType as proType, (case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tt.IsStock when 'P' then tb.IsStock end) as isStock, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),tb.ExPoint),0) as exPoint FROM (SELECT th.MainCode, th.CountActCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as th Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on th.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' and #nowTime# between th.ActivityFromDate and th.ActivityToDate WHERE th.ValidFlag = 1 and th.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# and th.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# and (th.BIN_OrganizationID='-8888' or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) GROUP BY th.MainCode, th.CountActCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType )as ta Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.PromotionCateCD, tpb.IsExchanged, tpb.StandardCost, tpb.ExPoint, tpb.IsStock FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID Left join( SELECT tpb.IsStock, tpv.BIN_ProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),tpc.SalePrice),0) AS salePrice FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_Product as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_ProductID = tpv.BIN_ProductID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductPrice as tpc with(nolock) on (tpv.BIN_ProductID = tpc.BIN_ProductID AND tpv.ValidFlag = tpc.ValidFlag AND tpc.Type = '2' AND tpc.EndDate >= #businessDate# AND tpc.StartDate <= #businessDate#) ) as tt on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tt.BIN_ProductVendorID Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tc with(nolock) on ta.MainCode = tc.SubCampaignCode Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult as tr with(nolock) on tc.BIN_CampaignRuleID = tr.BIN_CampaignRuleID and ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID=tr.BIN_ProductVendorID WHERE ta.MainCode = #activityCode# AND ta.ActivityType = #activityType# AND tc.ValidFlag = 1

SELECT Top 1 ta.MainCode as mainCode, tc.ActivityName as activityName, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tc.ActivitySign as activitySign, sum(case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Quantity when 'P' then 0 end) as quantity, sum(case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Quantity*tr.OldPrice when 'P' then -tr.OldPrice end) as oldPrice, sum(case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Quantity*tr.Price when 'P' then -tr.Price end) as price, min(ta.PrtType) as prtType, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),sum(tb.ExPoint)),0) as exPoint, CONVERT(nvarchar(19),ta.ActivityToDate,120) as ActivityToDate FROM (SELECT th.MainCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType, th.ActivityToDate FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as th Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on th.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' WHERE th.ValidFlag = 1 and th.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# and th.BIN_BrandInfoID =#brandInfoId# and (th.BIN_OrganizationID='-8888' or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) GROUP BY th.MainCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType, th.ActivityToDate )as ta Inner join( SELECT A.ActivityCode, A.ActivityName, B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID, C.ActivityType as ActivitySign FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity as A with(nolock) Inner join Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule as B with(nolock) on A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID Left join Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp as C with(nolock) on C.BIN_PromotionActGrpID = A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID ) as tc on ta.MainCode = tc.ActivityCode Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpb.ExPoint FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID and ta.PrtType = 'P' Left join Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult as tr with(nolock) on tc.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = tr.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID and ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tr.BIN_ProductVendorID WHERE ta.MainCode = #activityCode# AND ta.ActivityType = #activityType# AND #businessDate# <= ta.ActivityToDate group by ta.MainCode, tc.ActivityName, ta.ActivityType, tc.ActivitySign, ta.ActivityToDate

SELECT Top 1 ta.MainCode as mainCode, tc.SubCampaignName as activityName, ta.ActivityType as activityType, tp.CampaignType as activitySign, sum(case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Quantity when 'P' then 0 end) as quantity, sum(case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Quantity*tt.salePrice when 'P' then -tb.StandardCost end) as oldPrice, sum(case ta.PrtType when 'N' then tr.Quantity*tr.Price when 'P' then -tr.Price end) as price, min(ta.PrtType) as prtType, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),sum(tb.ExPoint)),0) as exPoint, CONVERT(nvarchar(19),ta.ActivityToDate,120) as ActivityToDate FROM (SELECT th.MainCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType, th.ActivityToDate FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis as th Left join Basis.BIN_Organization as tz with(nolock) on th.BIN_OrganizationID = tz.BIN_OrganizationID and tz.[Type] = '4' WHERE th.ValidFlag = 1 and th.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# and th.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# and (th.BIN_OrganizationID='-8888' or tz.DepartCode = #counterCode#) and #businessDate# Between th.ActivityFromDate and th.ActivityToDate GROUP BY th.MainCode, th.ActivityType, th.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, th.PrtType, th.ActivityToDate )as ta Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tc with(nolock) on ta.MainCode = tc.SubCampaignCode Left join Campaign.BIN_Campaign as tp on tc.BIN_CampaignID = tp.BIN_CampaignID Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult as tr with(nolock) on tc.BIN_CampaignRuleID = tr.BIN_CampaignRuleID and ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tr.BIN_ProductVendorID Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpb.StandardCost, tpb.ExPoint FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID and ta.PrtType = 'P' Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_ProductVendorID, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),tpc.SalePrice),0) AS salePrice FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductPrice as tpc with(nolock) on (tpv.BIN_ProductID = tpc.BIN_ProductID AND tpv.ValidFlag = tpc.ValidFlag AND tpc.Type = '2' AND tpc.EndDate >= #businessDate# AND tpc.StartDate <= #businessDate#) ) as tt on ta.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = tt.BIN_ProductVendorID WHERE ta.MainCode = #activityCode# AND ta.ActivityType = #activityType# AND tc.ValidFlag = 1 group by ta.MainCode, tc.SubCampaignName, ta.ActivityType, ta.ActivityToDate, tp.CampaignType
SELECT ActivityType FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis WHERE MainCode=#MainCode#

SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.PromotionCateCD, tpb.IsExchanged, tpb.ExPoint, tpb.IsStock FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID WHERE tpb.UnitCode=#UnitCode# and tpv.BarCode=#BarCode#

SELECT Top 1 td.MainCode as mainCode, tc.SubCampaignName as activityName, td.Quantity as quantity, tr.Amout as price, tr.Amout as oldPrice, td.GiftType as prtType, tp.CampaignType as activitySign FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder as tr with(nolock) Inner join Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail as td with(nolock) on tr.BIN_CampaignOrderID = td.BIN_CampaignOrderID Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tc with(nolock) on td.MainCode = tc.SubCampaignCode Left join Campaign.BIN_Campaign as tp with(nolock) on tp.BIN_CampaignID = tc.BIN_CampaignID WHERE tc.ValidFlag = 1 AND tr.ValidFlag = 1 AND tr.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #BIN_OrganizationInfoID# AND tr.BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND td.MainCode = #MainCode# AND tr.[State] = 'AR'
tr.BIN_MemberInfoID = #MemberInfoId#
tr.MemCode = #MemCode#
group by td.MainCode, tc.SubCampaignName, tr.Amout , td.GiftType, td.Quantity, tp.CampaignType

SELECT td.MainCode as mainCode, '' as counterActCode, '1' as activityType, 'LYHD' as promotionType, tr.TradeNoIF as orderId, tr.CouponCode as couponCode, tr.IsStock as isStock, td.BIN_ProductVendorID as productVendorId, td.UnitCode as unitCode, td.BarCode as barCode, (case td.GiftType when 'N' then tt.NameTotal when 'P' then tb.NameTotal end) as productName, td.Quantity as quantity, (case td.GiftType when 'N' then tt.salePrice when 'P' then -tb.StandardCost end) as oldPrice, (case td.GiftType when 'N' then tp.Price when 'P' then -tp.Price end) as price, td.Amout as amount, td.GiftType as proType, 0 as exPoint FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder as tr with(nolock) Inner join Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail as td with(nolock) on tr.BIN_CampaignOrderID = td.BIN_CampaignOrderID Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_ProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),tpb.SalePrice),0) AS salePrice FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_Product as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_ProductID = tpv.BIN_ProductID ) as tt on td.BIN_ProductVendorID = tt.BIN_ProductVendorID Left join( SELECT tpv.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, tpb.UnitCode, tpv.BarCode, tpb.NameTotal, tpb.PromotionCateCD, tpb.IsExchanged, tpb.StandardCost, tpb.ExPoint FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor as tpv with(nolock) Inner join Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct as tpb with(nolock) on tpb.BIN_PromotionProductID = tpv.BIN_PromotionProductID ) as tb on td.BIN_ProductVendorID = tb.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule as tc with(nolock) on td.MainCode = tc.SubCampaignCode Left join Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult as tp with(nolock) on tc.BIN_CampaignRuleID = tp.BIN_CampaignRuleID and td.BIN_ProductVendorID=tp.BIN_ProductVendorID WHERE tc.ValidFlag = 1 AND tr.ValidFlag = 1 AND tr.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #BIN_OrganizationInfoID# AND tr.BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND tr.CampaignCode = #subjectCode# AND td.MainCode = #MainCode# AND tr.[State] = 'AR'
tr.BIN_MemberInfoID = #MemberInfoId#
tr.MemCode = #MemCode#

SELECT LocalValidRule as localValidRule FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# AND CampaignCode=#subjectCode# AND MemCode=#memcode#

SELECT Mobile as mobile, MemCode as memcode FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder WHERE CampaignCode=#subjectCode#
Mobile = #mobile#
MemCode = #memCode#
